description: Detects usage of the "TcpClient" class. Which can be abused to establish remote connections and reverse-shells. As seen used by the Nishang "Invoke-PowerShellTcpOneLine" reverse shell.
author: FPT.EagleEye
wagga
false_positives: Administrative might use this function to check network connectivity
name: Potential Powershell ReverseShell Connection
query: (((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll")) OR (process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe))) AND (process.command_line.text:*\ System.Net.Sockets.TCPClient* AND process.command_line.text:*.GetBytes* AND process.command_line.text:*.Write*))
